Content:
Hi folks.

I have just joined the forum. I ride an Aprilia Shiver 750 and love the bike.
I am 61 and took up riding 2 years ago after a break of nearly 35 years.
We get a lot of rain here in winter, but no snow, so I ride all year, including to work every day (40km round trip)
Look forward to hear from other riders, especially Aprilia ones.
